thread.title: Rain a welcome aid for firefighters battling mountain fire
thread.title_full: Rain a welcome aid for firefighters battling mountain fire | News24

author: news24.com
title: Rain a welcome aid for firefighters battling mountain fire
text:
Cape Town - Two days of rain have helped firefighters to extinguish the blaze which broke out on Monday on the mountain in Murdock Valley, Simon's Town.
While an area high up the slopes remains ablaze, most of the flames have been doused, said Theo Lane, spokesperson for the City of Cape Town Fire and Rescue Services.
After the wind on Monday fanned the flames, the rain has brought welcome relief, he said.
“Our team will remain on the scene until the fire is completely extinguished.”
